channel.title: CVE Feed for flycart -- Discount Rules for WooCommerce – Create Smart WooCommerce Coupons & Discounts, Bulk Discount, BOGO Coupons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for flycart -- Discount Rules for WooCommerce – Create Smart WooCommerce Coupons & Discounts, Bulk Discount, BOGO Coupons

item.title: CVE-2020-36834|2024-10-16T19:13:16.958Z -- flycart -- discount%20rules%20for%20woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20create%20smart%20woocommerce%20coupons%20%26%20discounts%2C%20bulk%20discount%2C%20bogo%20coupons
item.description: The Discount Rules for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to missing authorization via several AJAX actions in versions up to, and including, 2.0.2 due to missing capability checks on various functions. This makes it possible for subscriber-level attackers to execute various actions and perform a wide variety of actions such as modifying rules and saving configurations.

item.title: CVE-2020-36834|2024-10-16T06:43:27.178Z -- flycart -- discount%20rules%20for%20woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20create%20smart%20woocommerce%20coupons%20%26%20discounts%2C%20bulk%20discount%2C%20bogo%20coupons
item.description: The Discount Rules for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to missing authorization via several AJAX actions in versions up to, and including, 2.0.2 due to missing capability checks on various functions. This makes it possible for subscriber-level attackers to execute various actions and perform a wide variety of actions such as modifying rules and saving configurations.

item.title: CVE-2024-8541|2024-10-16T02:05:01.072Z -- flycart -- discount%20rules%20for%20woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20create%20smart%20woocommerce%20coupons%20%26%20discounts%2C%20bulk%20discount%2C%20bogo%20coupons
item.description: The Discount Rules for WooCommerce – Create Smart WooCommerce Coupons & Discounts, Bulk Discount, BOGO Coupons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.5. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link. Please note that this is only exploitable when the 'Leave a Review' notice is present, which occurs after 100 orders are made and disappears after a user dismisses the notice.

item.title: CVE-2024-8541|2024-10-16T14:09:37.495Z -- flycart -- discount%20rules%20for%20woocommerce%20%E2%80%93%20create%20smart%20woocommerce%20coupons%20%26%20discounts%2C%20bulk%20discount%2C%20bogo%20coupons
item.description: The Discount Rules for WooCommerce – Create Smart WooCommerce Coupons & Discounts, Bulk Discount, BOGO Coupons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.5. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link. Please note that this is only exploitable when the 'Leave a Review' notice is present, which occurs after 100 orders are made and disappears after a user dismisses the notice.
